text: Louis Vincent Albano (July 29, 1933 â€“ October 14, 2009) was a very famous American professional wrestler in the 1980s. Albano is best known as Captain Lou Albano. He also appeared in Cyndi Lauper's music video "Girls Just Want to Have Fun" and played Mario on The Super Mario Bros.
